adminRecordTrade(address,uint256,bool).details: Use for backfilling from event logs

getTopVolumeTraders(uint256).details: Returns sorted by volume (descending) - gas intensive for large lists

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.isBuy: True for buy, false for sell
params.volume: The PLS value of the trade

params.referrer: The referrer address from URL param

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

adminRecordTrade(address,uint256,bool).notice: Manual admin function to record trades from historical data

calculateROI(address).notice: Calculate ROI for a user (percentage * 100 for precision)

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Emergency withdraw stuck funds to treasury

getTopROITraders(uint256).notice: Get top ROI traders (must meet minimum requirements)

recordTrade(address,uint256,bool,uint256.notice: Record a trade for leaderboard tracking

registerReferrer(address).notice: User can set their own referrer (for frontend integration)

setReferrer(address,address).notice: Set referrer for a user (called once, cannot be changed)
